Public MustInherit Class ButtonBase Inherits Control
public ref class ButtonBase abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會從繼承。You do not typically inherit from . 若要建立您自己按鈕的類別，繼承自， ，或類別。To create your own button class, inherit from the , , or class. 若要衍生的按鈕控制項顯示影像，請設定屬性或和屬性。To have the derived button control display an image, set the property or the and properties. 影像可以對齊按鈕控制項上設定屬性。The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the property. 同樣地，若要對齊顯示在按鈕控制項上，設定屬性。Likewise, to align the displayed on the button control, set the property. 屬性會決定樣式和控制項的外觀。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果屬性設定為，使用者的作業系統會判斷控制項的外觀。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.

value.span: 如果其他標籤文字的省略符號，就可以看出否則， 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`true`文字超出控制項的寬度，當使用者通過使用滑鼠控制項時顯示。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 您必須設定控制項的`AutoSize`屬性，以`false`如果您想要`true`。You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want to be `true`. 如果`AutoSize`是`true`控制項將會成長以容納文字，不會出現省略符號。If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ButtonBase1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ButtonBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#136](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#136)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#136](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#136)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱 [清除設定未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時屬性並類別設為`System`控制項會繪製為使用者的作業系統，核取對齊根據`CheckAlign`和屬性值。When the property of the and classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and property values. `CheckAlign`屬性值未變更，但控制項的外觀可能會受到影響。The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected. 核取方塊水平對齊控制項 （左或置中對齊會顯示左的對齊，以滑鼠右鍵會保持不變），向左或右邊緣和垂直對齊的描述性文字相同。The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text. 例如，如果您有用來控制`CheckAlign`屬性值為`ContentAlignment`。For example, if you have a control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`. `MiddleCenter`屬性值`ContentAlignment.TopRight`，而屬性值設定為`System`，核取方塊對齊方式會看起來似乎`ContentAlignment.TopLeft`時的文字對齊方式會維持不變。`MiddleCenter`, a property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何映像屬性不會顯示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中，和設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 結果會是一般的按鈕與文字左側和右側影像。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 這段程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`存入`C:\Graphics`目錄中，且參考命名空間是包含。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Size GetPreferredSize(valuetype System.Drawing.Size proposedSize) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPreferredSize (proposedSize As Size) As Size

param.name: proposedSize
param.span: The custom-sized area for a control.

span.span: The custom-sized area for a control.

summary.span: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.

span.span: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.

returns.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

span.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行為不同的控制項。The behavior of differs by control. 可能無法指派給控制項傳回的大小。The might be unable to assign the returned size to the control. 您可以傳回的大小大於所示的條件約束`proposedSize`參數，但`proposedSize`應該降低為條件約束會減少。You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases. 例如，`GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))`不能超出`GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`。For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`. 例外狀況`proposedSize`為 0 或`Size.Empty`，但它會定義為未受限制。The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則屬性會設定為`null`，和屬性會設定為其預設值為-1。When the property is set, the property will be set to `null`, and the property will be set to its default, -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何映像屬性不會顯示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中，和設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 結果會是一般的按鈕與文字左側和右側影像。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 這段程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`存入`C:\Graphics`目錄中，且參考命名空間是包含。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ImageIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ImageIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.

span.span: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.

value.span: 以零為起始的索引，表示中的影像位置。

span.span: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an .
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當或是設定的屬性，屬性設定為其預設值`null`。When the or properties are set, the property is set to its default value, `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性值變更為`null`，則屬性會傳回預設值為-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 不過，受指派值會保留在內部，並且用當另一個物件指派給屬性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果新指派給屬性具有屬性值小於或等於值指派給減一 （來負責正在以零為起始的索引集合） 的屬性屬性值會調整為其中一個小於屬性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，請考慮一個按鈕控制項包含三個映像，且其屬性設為 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果是新具有只有兩個映像指派給按鈕，值變更為 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， ，並設定和屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此程式碼需要已建立且最少 1 個已指派給它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此程式碼也需要您具有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`存入`C:\Graphics`目錄。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當或設定屬性，則屬性設定`null`，這是預設值。When the or property is set, the property is set `null`, which is its default value. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性值變更為`null`，則屬性會傳回預設值為-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 不過，受指派值會保留在內部，並且用當另一個指派給屬性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another is assigned to the property. 如果新指派給屬性具有屬性值小於或等於值指派給減一的屬性 （因為集合是以零為起始的索引），則屬性值會調整為其中一個小於屬性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (because the collection is a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，請考慮一個按鈕控制項包含三個映像，且其屬性設為 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果是新具有只有兩個映像指派給按鈕，值變更為 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， ，並設定和屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此程式碼需要已建立且最少 1 個已指派給它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此程式碼也需要您具有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`存入`C:\Graphics`目錄。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button control is the default button.

span.span: if the button control is the default button; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，按鈕是預設按鈕的。When the property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the . 這表示如果沒有其他按鈕已按下 ENTER 鍵，或擷取 ENTER 鍵的任何其他控制項有焦點時按下按鈕。This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus. 若要指定表單的預設按鈕，設定表單所需的按鈕的屬性。To specify the default button of a form, set the property of the form to the desired button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 請勿呼叫如果按鈕停用 (這包括基底類別的呼叫方法，當您覆寫衍生類別中)。Do not call if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's method when you override in a derived class). 停用的覆寫中的按鈕時，呼叫基底類別的方法，然後再停用 按鈕，或不要完全呼叫它。When disabling the button in an override of , call the base class's method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中，和設定的某些常見屬性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 結果會是一般的按鈕與文字左側和右側影像。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 這段程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`存入`C:\Graphics`目錄中，且參考命名空間是包含。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版中的相容性的文字呈現。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性要提供視覺化的相容性，Windows Form 控制項之間呈現文字使用類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂的文字轉譯使用類別。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式不從正在升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或是[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎類別中導入[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了改善效能，讓文字看起來好，並改善的國際字型支援。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，則[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎類別用來執行所有的文字呈現。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距] 和 [自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用類別來呈現文字，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解決此不相容情況，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性設`true`特定控制項。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`要`true`針對應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫方法的參數`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

span.span: if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化樣式是控制項的外觀規格。Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls. 比方說，視覺化樣式可以定義的色彩、 大小和字型的控制項，並可讓您設定協調您的應用程式介面的視覺化介面。For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface. 此外，它們會提供所有的 Windows 型應用程式，將套用的視覺化樣式的機制。Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.
